ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 11 items, Lens includes manufacturer's warranty & supplied accessories , All other items are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Standard Zoom Lens (lens packaged in white retail box)
UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filter - CPL (Circular Polarizer) Filter - FL-D (Fluorescent) Filter - Filter Case
Protective Pull String Closer Soft Lens Pouch - High Quality 2 in 1 Lens Cleaning Pen - Soft Rubber Lens Hood
High Quality Dust Cleaner Blower - Universal Lens Cap Keeper - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Standard Autofocus Zoom Lens for Canon EOS 7D, 60D, EOS Rebel SL1, T1i, T2i, T3, T3i, T4i, T5i, XS, XSi, XT, & XTi Digital SLR Cameras + 10pc Bundle Deluxe Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
